headline: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) and Juniper Revolutionise Telecom with AI-Driven Network Automation
summary: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) recently extended its collaboration with Juniper Networks, integrating AI-native networking solutions across several platforms. This partnership and other product launches seem to enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs, aligning with the company's broader ambitions to lead in AI and enterprise automation. Despite broader market indices experiencing varied performances, ServiceNow's stock rose 33% over the last month, likely reflecting investor optimism around...
